treasury.tips: Estimated $1,000,000,000+ contribution from BitDAO partners per annum

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: BitDAO’s vision is open finance and a decentralized tokenized economy.

innovation.title: Accelerate Innovation and Growth
innovation.content: BitDAO aims to use significant financial and talent resources to accelerate innovation and growth across the DeFi space.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: BitDAO will collaborate with emerging and existing DeFi protocols and teams — through grants, token swaps, and R&D support. BitDAO will build its own protocols. We seek talented developers, community managers and other contributors to join us.

counts.title: Every Bit Counts
counts.subtitle: BIT holders own BitDAO and the control of the treasury
content: Vote to upgrade the BitDAO protocol
Successful proposals are automatically executed on-chain
Delegate votes to your favorite community leader

participate.p1: We are calling on the community to define and build our vision together.
participate.p2: Participate in our forum and submit proposals.

content.title: BYBIT SUPPORT
content.desc: Bybit is the first partner of BitDAO, contributing 2.5bps of futures trading volume to the BitDAO treasury.

content.title: PARTNERSHIPS
content.desc: Token swap with DeFi protocols and CeFi projects and expand the BitDAO ecosystem. Accumulate a collection of the best DeFi assets.

content.title: BUILDING PROTOCOLS
content.desc: Launch innovative products on the BitDAO protocol.Integrate with the industry’s leading protocols.

BitDAODesc: Supporting open finance and a decentralized tokenized economy
HomeSubtitle: Allocate the world's largest DAO-directed treasury, partner with leading protocols, and build the future of finance.
PartnerContributionsTips: *Pledged and actual contributions, including 2.5bps of Bybit daily futures trading volume
Protocol Upgrades eg: e.g. New BitDAO products and partner integrations
growingDesc:
We are calling on the community to define and build our vision together.
Participate in our forum and governance process.
